name: Hyper Chess
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;PvP;Online PvP;Shared/Split Screen PvP;Shared/Split Screen;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Remote Play Together;Family Sharing
description: There are NO TURNS in this wild version of Chess! Pieces move across the board in real-time, so you'll need to think fast to protect your King!

name: Man Simulator 2025
categories: Single-player;Custom Volume Controls;Playable without Timed Input;Stereo Sound;Family Sharing
description: Escape contemporary manhood as you gamble, vape, and consume your way to the light. Discover unique paths to unravel the secrets that lie within the simulation.

name: Welcome to Camp Blue Lake
description: You fight with the voices in your head that keep telling you to hurt people. Can you stop it?

name: The Abyssal Descent
description: A 80-level vertical descent through surreal pixel worlds. No saves. No mercy. Just fall and survive.

name: Silent Street
description: You are an independent journalist drawn to a mysterious, abandoned housing development. Explore the eerie street, uncover hidden clues, and solve puzzles to reveal the dark truth behind its sudden stop. A short, atmospheric horror experience with tension, mystery, and jump scares.

name: Drunken Wolf
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Playable without Timed Input;Family Sharing
description: During a hangover, the wolf always hunts anime girls. No one can escape from the wolf. Wolf simulator with innovative VFX drunkenness effect. Eat all anime girls.

name: Hextalia
categories: Single-player;Camera Comfort;Custom Volume Controls;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Stereo Sound;Surround Sound;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing
description: Hextalia is a strategic tower defense where you craft powerful items and attach them to your towers. Shape enemy paths with walls, craft the desired items, defend corrupted crystals, and unlock new powers as you grow your collection. Build, defend, and adapt.

name: The Mountain and The Moron Rogue Mode
description: This DLC turns The Mountain and The Moron into a rogue like! With randomly made stages and items to help you reach the top of the mountain where you lost your phone from last time!

name: What Happened Here?
categories: Single-player;Full controller support;Captions available;Custom Volume Controls;Keyboard Only Option;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Touch Only Option;Family Sharing
description: What Happened Here is a short adventure horror game: around 30-45 minutes, exploring the classic horror trope of being locked inside a house and exploring it in order to go out.

name: Welcome to Camp Blue Lake Demo
Mercie and the Fairies
categories: Single-player;Custom Volume Controls;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Family Sharing
description: Start with a broken phone... and follow Mercie, a lazy witch, as she juggles shiny fairies, weird upgrades and a cauldron that turns anything into everything! Brew all kinds of stuff, grow your witchy life and embrace the cozy chaos in this delightfully offbeat incremental idle game

name: Campfire Stories: The Giant of Green Peaks
description: A campfire horror story has become real for you. Waking up deep within the Green Peaks Reserve you find yourself in the lair of an unknown monster. Now your only choice is to escape through the misty forest, along the black-water lake, hiding behind the ancient pines.
